description: This file implements a Next.js page component that handles OAuth callback from Jira. It manages the authorization result, displays success or error messages, and redirects accordingly. The core functionality involves reading URL search parameters, setting state, and rendering a suspense boundary.

methods.name: JiraOAuthCallbackPage
methods.description: Main component wrapping the OAuth callback logic within a Suspense boundary.

methods.name: JiraOAuthCallbackInner
methods.description: Inner component handling OAuth result processing, displaying success/error feedback, and redirecting.
